message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value to you at $1,200,000. I understand its importance to you and am eager to facilitate this transaction. To make it more attractive, I am offering you the chance to purchase this remarkable item for $950,000. This price reflects a thoughtful compromise, ensuring both parties' satisfaction while maximizing the value for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, or if you require any additional information to make your decision.
